title: [酒馆地图]REDSTONE HOTEL——红石酒馆|来找到地方坐坐♂
author: Qwe_Sakura
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Qwe_Sakura 于 2020-3-24 22:10 编辑 

REDSTONE HOTEL
什么是REDSTONE HOTEL? REDSTONE HOTEL是由ORELUED, SEBALP制作的一张建筑地图版本为1.15.2这是他的图的介绍This is an art nouveau hotel with major red stone integration. A functional keycard system leads you to three types of rooms.
The first one being the basic, the second being the luxury apartment with views over the main entrance area and the most important being the ultra luxury apartment with stunning ceiling lights. Genuine art nouveau features and many other amenities that offer an unique experience.
Additionally you can find a dining area, a grand theatre room with an integrated restaurant and a large swimming area pared with an outside pool. The library and the bar on the upper floors guarantee a realistic experience of architecture and old world charm.
Don't forget to use the multi floor elevator and also check out the lighting system.
这是一家以艺术风格位主题的新酒店，这里面拥有着大量的红色科技。你需要使用钥匙卡将你带到三种类型的房间。第一个是基础房，第二个是可以看到入口的景致的豪华公寓，着不是最主要的最主要的是带有令人惊叹的天花板灯的超豪华公寓。着是真正的新艺术风格并且还带有许多其他设施，这些设施可提供你独特的生活体验。另外，你还可以去用餐区，带综合餐厅的大剧院室和带室外游泳池的大型游泳区。我们还有图书馆和位于较高楼层的酒吧他们可以确保为你带来真实的建筑体验和旧世界的魅力。不要忘记使用电梯，你还需要检查灯光的照明系统。
我要怎么下载REDSTONE HOTEL? One原帖Two百度云盘8gxsThree腾讯微云
REDSTONE HOTEL的视频https://youtu.be/DBrLXRD-nDo
REDSTONE HOTEL的游戏内截图
